# Enhancing Awareness of External Environment
![](data:image/png;base64,)
# Environmental Scanning and Monitoring
- <mark style="background: #FF5582A6;">Environmental scanning</mark>: surveillance of a firm's external environment
	- Predicts changes to environment to come
	- Detects changes under way
	- Allows firms to be proactive
- <mark style="background: #FF5582A6;">Environmental monitoring</mark>: tracks evolution of environmental trends
	- Sequences of measurable facts/events
	- Streams of activities or trends from outside the organization
# Environmental Forecasting
- <mark style="background: #FF5582A6;">Env. forecasting</mark>: predicts change
		- Plausable
